snippet.name: reg_admin
snippet.starttext: <cfmodule template="/#request.SEMap#/config/init/reg_admin.cfm" location="CONTENT" modname="$${modname}" module="$${modcontent:#attributes.modPath#/mod_content.cfm}" title="$${title}" editdialog="$${modcontent:#attributes.modPath#/mod_edit_dialog.cfm}" allowmultiple="$${allowmultiple:yes|no}" allowonpage="$${allowonpage:yes|no}" allowontemplate="$${allowontemplate:yes|no}" editdialogtabs="" editdialogwidth="$${editdialogwidth:500}" editdialogheight="$${editdialogheight:400}" moduleclass="$${moduleclass:CONTENTMODULE}" searchable="$${searchable:no|yes}" >
